snippet: Bernard Gassaway, the principal of Boys and Girls High School in Bedford-Stuyvesant, offered Mayor Bill de Blasio’s Education Department one of its sternest public rebukes yet.
abstract: Bernard Gassaway resigns as principal of Boys and Girls High School in Brooklyn; criticizes New York Mayor Bill de Blasio and the Department of Education for not having a plan to help struggling schools improve.
lead_paragraph: Bernard Gassaway, the principal of Boys and Girls High School in Bedford-Stuyvesant, offered Mayor Bill de Blasio’s Education Department one of its sternest public rebukes yet.

headline.main: Principal of Failing Brooklyn School Quits, Saying City Lacks an Education Plan
headline.print_headline: Principal of Failing School Quits, Saying City Lacks an Education Plan

keywords.value: Boys and Girls High School (Brooklyn, NY)
